hero.title: I am very excited web developer who does what he enjoys.
hero.subTitle: I work with modern technologies, but when needed, I like to learn new things.
projects.title: Curently working on?
projects.github.text: Or even better checkout my Github
hobbies.title: What do I enjoy?
hobbies.subTitle: Being a modern technology enthusiast for me, I'm especially known for constantly learning something new. My favorites in development at the moment are mainly - React (Next.JS) and Firebase, and if you're interested in more - you can find my whole stack here.
about.subTitle: I'm a student of Unicorn University, I like to create web apps, I'm enthusiastic about new technologies and I like to discover new ways to do something better. My goal is to make all my creations fast, secure and modern. After a perfect job is done, I'd love to chat with you about anything from the IT world and in general.
